augments.name: Accomplice

augments.name: Unburdened II

augments.name: All That Shimmers+

augments.desc:
Gain a Lesser Champion Duplicator. Gain another after 5 player combats.

This item allows you to copy a 3-cost or less champion.

augments.name: Team Building
augments.desc: Gain a Lesser Champion Duplicator. Gain another after 3 player combats.

augments.name: Assassin's Toolbox
augments.desc: Gain a Prowlerâ€™s Claw and an Infinity Edge.

augments.name: At What Cost
augments.desc: Immediately go to level 6 and gain 4 XP. You don't get to choose your future augments.

augments.name: Avenge the Fallen
augments.desc: After 3 allies die, your team gains 28% Attack Damage, 28 Ability Power, 28 Armor, and 28 Magic Resist.

augments.name: Axiom Arc I
augments.desc: Your units gain 25 Mana on kill.

augments.name: Axiom Arc II
augments.desc: Your units gain 30 Mana on kill.

augments.name: Ba-BOOM!
augments.desc: Your champions deal 90% more damage for 2 seconds on every other cast.

augments.name: Balanced Budget
augments.desc: At the start of the next 4 rounds, gain 7 gold.

augments.name: Balanced Budget
augments.desc: At the start of the next 4 rounds, gain 7 gold.

augments.name: Balanced Budget+
augments.desc: At the start of the next 4 rounds, gain 10 gold.

augments.name: Balanced Budget III
augments.desc: At the start of the next 4 rounds, Gain 10 Gold.

augments.name: Band of Thieves II
augments.desc: Gain 2 Thief's Gloves.

augments.name: Band of Thieves I
augments.desc: Gain 1 Thief's Gloves.

augments.name: Caretaker's Ally
augments.desc: Gain a random 2-cost champion now. Gain the same one again every time you level up.

augments.name: Caretaker's Favor
augments.desc:
Gain a component anvil when you reach level 5, 6, 7, and 8.

The anvil offers 4 choices.

augments.name: Caretaker's Chosen
augments.desc:
As you level, gain more powerful items.
Level 4: component anvil
Level 6: completed item anvil
Level 7: choose 1 of 5 Radiant items

augments.name: Battlemage I
augments.desc: Your units that start combat in the front 2 rows gain 15 Armor and 15 Ability Power.

augments.name: Battlemage II
augments.desc: Your units that start combat in the front 2 rows gain 25 Armor and 25 Ability Power.

augments.name: BattlemageIII
augments.desc: Your units that start combat in the front 2 rows gain 35 Armor and 35 Ability Power.

augments.name: Battle Ready
augments.desc: Your team deals 3% more damage and takes 3% less damage.

augments.name: Battle Ready II
augments.desc: Your team deals 6% more damage and takes 6% less damage.

augments.name: Battle Ready III
augments.desc: Your team deals 8% more damage and takes 8% less damage.

augments.name: Beggars Can Be Choosers
augments.desc: You get +3 Augment rerolls for all other augment choices. Gain 7 gold.

augments.name: Best Friends I
augments.desc: Units isolated in pairs gain 12% Attack Speed and 12 Armor at the start of combat.

augments.name: Best Friends II
augments.desc: Units isolated in pairs gain 15% Attack Speed and 20 Armor at the start of combat.

augments.name: Better Together
augments.desc: Aura items that buff your team have their effects increased by 33%. Gain a Locket of the Iron Solari

augments.name: Big Friend I

augments.name: Big Friend II
augments.desc: Your units that start combat next to a unit with over 1600 Health take 10% less damage for the rest of combat.

augments.name: Big Gains

Gain 3 random components, 2 gold, and 1 Reforger.

Reforgers allow you to remake any item.

augments.name: Blank Slate

augments.name: Blinding Speed
augments.desc:
Gain a Giant Slayer, Guinsoo's Rageblade, a Recurve Bow and a Magnetic Remover.

Useful for Attack Carries!

augments.name: Lunch Money
augments.desc: Every 8 damage you deal to enemy tacticians gives you 2 gold.

augments.name: Blood Money

augments.name: Blossoming Lotus I
augments.desc: Your team's Abilities can critically strike. Every 3 seconds, your team gains 5% Critical Strike Chance.

augments.name: Blossoming Lotus II

augments.name: Blue Battery I
augments.desc: After casting their Ability, your units restore 10 Mana.

augments.name: Blue Battery II

augments.name: Branching Out
augments.desc:
Gain a random Emblem and a Reforger.

Reforgers allow you to remake any item.

augments.name: Silver Ticket

augments.name: Build a Bud!

augments.name: Buried Treasures II

augments.name: Buried Treasures III

augments.name: Calculated Loss

Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.

augments.name: Celestial Blessing I

augments.name: Celestial Blessing II

augments.name: Celestial Blessing III

augments.name: Combat Bandages II

augments.name: Ascension

augments.name: Partial Ascension

augments.name: Rolling For Days I
augments.desc: Gain 11 free Shop rerolls.

augments.name: Consistency

augments.name: Cybernetic Bulk II

augments.name: Cybernetic Bulk III

augments.name: Cybernetic Implants II

augments.name: Cybernetic Implants III

augments.name: Cybernetic Leech II

augments.name: Cybernetic Leech III

augments.name: Cybernetic Shell II

augments.name: Cybernetic Shell III

augments.name: Cybernetic Uplink II

augments.name: Spoils of War II

augments.name: Spoils of War III

augments.name: Electrocharge II

augments.name: Explosive Growth+

augments.name: Final Grab Bag II

Each time an allied champion dies, 30% Shred and Sunder the nearest 4 enemies for 6 seconds.

Shred: reduces Magic Resist, Sunder: reduces Armor

augments.name: Unified Resistance II
augments.desc: If you have 3 or more champions in the same row at the start of combat, they all gain 25 Armor and Magic Resist.

augments.name: Future Sight I

augments.name: Future Sight II

augments.name: Prismatic Ticket
augments.desc: Each time your Shop is rerolled, you have a 45% chance to gain a free reroll.

augments.name: Gadget Expert

augments.name: Gargantuan Resolve

augments.name: Giant and Mighty

augments.desc: Gain 3 random components, 4 gold, and a Lesser Champion Duplicator.

augments.name: Spectral Supplies
augments.desc: Combat start: Distribute 4 temporary items to the champions with the fewest items.

augments.name: Gifts from the fallen

Your team gains 3% Attack Damage, 3 Ability Power, 3 Armor, and 3 Magic Resist.

Each time an ally dies, gain these stats again.

You no longer gain interest. Gain 15 gold now. Round start: gain 4 XP.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.

augments.name: Good For Something II
augments.desc: Champions that aren't holding items have a 50% to drop 1 gold on death.

augments.name: Good For Something I
augments.desc: Champions that aren't holding items have a 50% to drop 1 gold on death.

augments.name: Gotta Go Fast!
augments.desc: Your team generates 10% more mana and moves 35% faster.

augments.name: Gotta Go Fast! II

augments.name: Gotta Go Fast!!! III

(Omnivamp: healing for a percent of damage dealt)

augments.name: Harmacist II
augments.desc:
Your team has 15% Omnivamp and converts 25% of excess healing to true damage on their next attack.

(Omnivamp: healing for a percent of damage dealt)

augments.name: Harmacist III
augments.desc:
Your team has 25% Omnivamp and converts 30% of excess healing to true damage on their next attack.

(Omnivamp: healing for a percent of damage dealt)

augments.name: Delayed Start

augments.name: Healing Orbs I

augments.name: Healing Orbs II
augments.desc: When an enemy dies, the nearest ally is healed for 450.

augments.name: Heavy Hitters
augments.desc: Your units with at least 1500 max Health gain Attack Damage and Ability Power equal to 1% of their max Health.

augments.name: Hedge Fund
augments.desc:
Gain 25 gold. Your max interest is increased to 10.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.

augments.name: Hedge Fund+
augments.desc:
Gain 30 gold. Your max interest is increased to 10.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.

augments.name: Hedge Fund++
augments.desc:
Gain 40 gold. Your max interest is increased to 10.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.

augments.name: Help Is On The Way
augments.desc: After 8 player combats, choose 1 of 4 Support items.

augments.name: Heroic Grab Bag
augments.desc:
Gain 2 Lesser Champion Duplicators and 9 gold.

This item allows you to copy a 3-cost or less champion.

augments.name: Shopping Spree
augments.desc: When you level up, gain a number of free shop refreshes equal to your level+1. Gain 4 gold.

augments.name: High End Shopping

augments.name: High Voltage
augments.desc: Gain an Ionic Spark. Your Ionic Sparks have +3 hex radius and do 25% more damage.

augments.name: Hustler

augments.name: Idealism

augments.name: Immovable Object

augments.name: Impenetrable Bulwark

Useful for Magic Tanks or Attack Tanks!

augments.name: Scrappy Inventions
augments.desc: Combat start: Up to 5 equipped components turn into completed items for the rest of combat. Gain a component at the start of the next 2 stages.

augments.name: I'm the Carry Now
augments.desc: Get a Golem with tailored offensive items. It gets stronger at the start of each Stage.

augments.name: Inconsistency
augments.desc: If your streak is less than 3, gain 2 gold.

augments.name: Indomitable Will

augments.name: Infernal Contract

augments.name: Infusion
augments.desc: Your team restores 20 Mana every 5 seconds.

augments.name: Inspiring Epitaph

augments.name: Invested+

augments.name: Invested++

augments.name: Iron Assets
augments.desc:
Gain a component anvil and 4 gold.

The anvil offers 4 choices.

augments.name: Item Collector I

augments.name: Item Collector II

augments.name: Item Grab Bag I
augments.desc: Gain 1 random completed item.

augments.name: Item Grab Bag II
augments.desc: Gain 2 random completed items and 2 Reforgers.

augments.name: Item Grab Bag II
augments.desc: Gain a random completed item, a random component, and 1 gold.

augments.name: Item Grab Bag III
augments.desc: Gain 2 random full items and 4 Gold.

augments.name: Item Ladder
augments.desc: Gain a temporary item that unequips and transforms at the start of each round. The item quality increases each Stage.

augments.name: It Pays To Learn
augments.desc: Gain 10 XP and 8 gold.

augments.name: It Pays to Learn II
augments.desc: Gain 16 XP and 12 gold.

augments.name: It Pays to Learn III
augments.desc: Gain 24 XP and 16 gold.

augments.name: Missing Link
augments.desc: After you refresh your shop 40 times, gain a copy of each Tier 5 unit.

augments.name: Jeweled Lotus II
augments.desc: Your team gains 15% Critical Strike chance, and their Abilities can critically strike.

augments.name: Frequent Flier
augments.desc: After you reroll your shop 8 times, reroll only cost 1 gold.

augments.name: Keepers I
augments.desc: Combat start: grant units with adjacent allies a 145 Health Shield for 8 seconds. This Shield stacks.

augments.name: Keepers II
augments.desc: Combat start: grant units with adjacent allies a 230 Health Shield for 8 seconds. This Shield stacks.

augments.name: Knife's Edge I
augments.desc: Your units that start combat in the front 2 rows gain 15 Attack Damage.

augments.name: Knife's Edge II
augments.desc: Your units that start combat in the front 2 rows gain 25 Attack Damage.

augments.name: Knife's Edge III
augments.desc: Your units that start combat in the first 2 rows gain 55% Attack Damage.

augments.name: Library Card
augments.desc: Gain a Tome of Traits and a Component Anvil

augments.name: Know Your Enemy
augments.desc:
Your team deals 10% more damage.

Deal 15% more damage instead if you and your opponent have any of the same traits active.

augments.name: Last Stand
augments.desc: The first time you would be eliminated, you escape death and your team permanently gains 160 Health, 16 Armor and Magic Resist, and 16% Omnivamp.

augments.name: Lategame Specialist
augments.desc: When you reach Level 9, gain 33 gold.

augments.name: Patient Study
augments.desc: After player combat, gain 2 XP if you won or 3 XP if you lost.

augments.name: Learning To Spell
augments.desc: Your team gains 12 bonus Ability Power, and permanently gains 1 Ability Power every 2 takedowns.

augments.name: Jeweled Lotus I
augments.desc: Combat Start: Your strongest unit gains 40% critical strike chance and their spells can critically strike.

augments.name: Little Buddies
augments.desc: Your 4-cost and 5-cost champions gain 65 Health and 7% Attack Speed for every 1-cost and 2-cost champion on your board.

augments.name: Living Forge
augments.desc:
Gain an Artifact anvil now and after every 9 player combats.

Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.

augments.name: Living Forge
augments.desc: Gain an Artifact anvil now and after every 4 player combats.

augments.name: Long Distance Pals
augments.desc: Combat start: Your 2 units furthest from each other form a bond, sharing 22% of their Armor, Magic Resist, Attack Damage, and Ability Power with each other.

augments.name: Latent Forge
augments.desc:
After 8 player combats, gain an Artifact anvil.

The anvil offers 4 choices. Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.

augments.name: Latent Forge
augments.desc: After 4 player combats, gain an Artifact anvil.

augments.name: Low Interest Rates
augments.desc:
Your max interest is capped at 4 gold but you gain 2 gold at the start of every player combat.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.

augments.name: Lucky Gloves
augments.desc: Thief's Gloves will always give your champions ideal items. Gain 2 Sparring Gloves. In 7 rounds, get another Sparring Gloves.

augments.name: Lucky Gloves+
augments.desc: Thief's Gloves will always give your champions ideal items. Gain 3 Sparring Gloves.

augments.name: Lucky Streak
augments.desc:
Gain a Gambler's Blade and a Magnetic Remover.

Gambler's Blade helps you gain gold.

augments.name: Lucky Streak
augments.desc: Gain a Gambler's Blade and a Magnetic Remover.

augments.name: Luden's Echo I
augments.desc: When your units cast and deal Ability damage, the first target hit and a nearby enemy take 35-80 (based on current Stage) magic damage.

augments.name: Luden's Echo II
augments.desc: When your units cast and deal Ability damage, the first target hit and a nearby enemy take 50-110 (based on current Stage) magic damage.

augments.name: Luden's Echo III
augments.desc: When your units cast and deal Ability damage, the first target hit and a nearby enemy take 90-210 (based on current Stage) magic damage.

augments.name: Makeshift Armor I
augments.desc: Your units with no items gain 30 Armor and Magic Resist.

augments.name: Makeshift Armor II
augments.desc: Your units with no items gain 45 Armor and Magic Resist.

augments.name: Makeshift Armor III
augments.desc: Your units with no items gain 65 Armor and Magic Resist.

augments.name: Marksman's Toolbox
augments.desc: Gain a Sniper's Focus. In 3 rounds, gain a Fishbones.

augments.name: Martyr
augments.desc: Whenever one of your allies die, your team heals for 9% of their max Health.

augments.name: Level Up!
augments.desc: When you buy XP, gain an additional 2. Gain 12 immediately.

augments.name: Medium-End Shopping
augments.desc: Gain a 1 gold. Champions appear in the first 3 slots of your Shop as if you were 1 level higher.

augments.name: Mentorship I
augments.desc: If an ally starts combat next to a higher-cost ally, it gains 12% Attack Speed and 120 Health.

augments.name: Mentorship II
augments.desc: If an ally starts combat next to a higher-cost ally, it gains 18% Attack Speed and 220 Health.

augments.name: Metabolic Accelerator
augments.desc: Gain 2 player health after every player combat. Your Tactician also moves faster.

augments.name: Missed Connections
augments.desc: Gain a copy of each 1-cost champion.

augments.name: Wellness Trust
augments.desc: Round Start: Gain 3 gold. If you have at least 40 gold, heal 2 player Health.

augments.name: Money Laundering
augments.desc: You earn no interest, but at the start of every player combat round gain 1 Gold per 2 units on your bench.

augments.name: New Recruit
augments.desc: Gain +1 max team size and a Champion Duplicator.

augments.name: Not Today
augments.desc: Gain an Edge of Night. Champions holding this item gain 35% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Magic Wand
augments.desc: Gain a Needlessly Large Rod. Your units gain 18 Ability Power.

augments.name: On a Roll
augments.desc: Whenever you star up a champion, gain up to 3 free Shop rerolls per round. Gain 3 gold.

augments.name: Endless Hordes
augments.desc: Gain +3 maximum team size, but your units can only hold 1 item and their total health is reduced by 15%. Gain 4 gold.

augments.name: Endless Hordes+
augments.desc: Gain +3 maximum team size, but your units can only hold 1 item and their total health is reduced by 15%. Gain 4 gold.

augments.name: One, Two, Five!
augments.desc: Gain 1 random component, 2 gold, and 1 random 5-cost champion.

augments.name: Ones Twos Three
augments.desc: Gain 2 1-cost champion, 2 2-cost champions, and 1 3-cost champion.

augments.name: On The House
augments.desc: Whenever you star up a champion, gain 1 gold. Gain 4 gold now.

augments.name: Over Encumbered
augments.desc: For the next stage, you only get 1 bench slot. After, get 3 item components.

augments.name: Overwhelming Force
augments.desc:
Gain a Deathblade, an Infinity Edge, a BF Sword, and a Magnetic Remover.

Useful for Attack Carries or Attack Fighters!

augments.name: Pandora's Bench
augments.desc: Gain 2 gold. At the start of every round, champions on the 3 rightmost bench slots transform into random champions of the same cost.

augments.name: Pandora's Items
augments.desc:
Round start: items on your bench are randomized.

Gain 1 random component.

augments.name: Pandora's Items II
augments.desc:
Round start: items on your bench are randomized.

Gain 2 random components.

augments.name: Pandora's Items III
augments.desc:
Round start: items on your bench are randomized.

Gain 1 random Radiant item.

augments.name: Patience is a Virtue
augments.desc: Each round, gain 2 free rerolls if you did not buy a champion last round.

augments.name: Phreaky Friday
augments.desc:
Gain an Infinity Force. After 5 player combats, gain another.

Infinity Force: Artifact that offers tons of offensive and defensive stats

augments.name: Phreaky Friday
augments.desc: Gain an Infinity Force. After 3 player combats, gain another.

augments.name: Phreaky Friday +
augments.desc:
Gain an Infinity Force. After 3 player combats, gain another.

Infinity Force: Artifact that offers tons of offensive and defensive stats

augments.name: Phreaky Friday+
augments.desc: Gain an Infinity Force. After 2 player combats, gain another.

augments.name: Pick of the Litter
augments.desc: Open a special Shop with 3 free 3-cost champions. You can only pick 1, but you get 2 copies of it.

augments.name: Pick of the Litter+
augments.desc: Open a special Shop with 3 free 4-cost champions. You can only pick 1, but you get 2 copies of it.

augments.name: Pilfer
augments.desc: Each round, gain a 1-star copy of the first champion you killed last combat.

augments.name: Placebo
augments.desc: Gain 8 gold. Your team gains 1% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Placebo+
augments.desc: Gain 15 gold. Your team gains 1% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Portable Forge
augments.desc:
Choose 1 of 4 Artifacts.

Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.

augments.name: Portable Forge+
augments.desc: Choose 1 of 3 Artifacts.

augments.name: Portable Forge++
augments.desc: Choose 1 of 4 Artifacts.

augments.name: Potions 201
augments.desc: Witch curses last forever. Witch Abilities also curse the nearest uncursed champion. If all champions are cursed, Witches gain 20% Attack Damage and Ability Power. Gain a Poppy and a Cassiopeia.

augments.name: Precise Planning
augments.desc: When you win or lose combat by 4 or fewer units, gain 2 gold next round.

augments.name: Preparation I
augments.desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain 25 Health, 3% Attack Damage and 3 Ability Power every round. Champions start with I stack of this effect, and can stack up to 4 times.

augments.name: Preparation I
augments.desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain 35, 4 Attack Damage and Ability Power every round, up to 3 times.

augments.name: Preparation II
augments.desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain 35 Health, 4% Attack Damage and 4 Ability Power every round. Champions start with I stack of this effect, and can stack up to 4 times.

augments.name: Preparation II
augments.desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain 50, 6 Attack Damage and Ability Power every round, up to 3 times.

augments.name: Preparation III
augments.desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain 50 Health, 7% Attack Damage and 7 Ability Power every round. Champions start with I stack of this effect, and can stack up to 4 times.

augments.name: Preparation III
augments.desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain 70, 9% Attack Damage and Ability Power every round, up to 3 times.

augments.name: Prizefighter
augments.desc: Gain 2 item components. Every 5 wins gives you an item component.

augments.name: Pumping Up I
augments.desc: Your team gains 6% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain 0.5% more.

augments.name: Pumping Up II
augments.desc: Your team gains 8% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain 1% more.

augments.name: Pumping Up III
augments.desc: Your team gains 16% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain 2% more.

augments.name: Radiant Refactor
augments.desc:
Gain a Masterwork Upgrade and 1 component anvil.

Masterwork Upgrade upgrades an item to Radiant!

augments.name: Radiant Relics
augments.desc:
Choose 1 of 5 Radiant items. Gain a Magnetic Remover.

Radiant items are very powerful versions of completed items.

augments.name: Raining Gold
augments.desc: Gain 8 gold now and 1 gold every round.

augments.name: Raining Gold+
augments.desc: Gain 18 gold now and 1 gold every round.

augments.name: Reach The Summit
augments.desc: When you reach Level 9, gain 10 gold and 50.

augments.name: Recombobulator
augments.desc: Champions on your board permanently transform into random champions 1 cost tier higher (max 5). Gain 2 Magnetic Removers.

augments.name: Blistering Strikes
augments.desc: Your team's attacks Burn their targets for 5% of their max Health over 5 seconds. Attacks also reduce their targets' healing received by 33%.

augments.name: ReinFOURcement
augments.desc: The next 4-cost champion you buy is instantly upgraded to 2-star. Get 12 gold.

augments.name: Replication
augments.desc: Choose 1 of 3 components. For the next 2 rounds, gain a copy of that component.

augments.name: Restart Mission
augments.desc: Remove all champions on your board and bench. Gain 2 random 2-star 3-costs, 3 2-star 2-costs, and 1 2-star 1-cost champion.

augments.name: Return on Investment
augments.desc: When you reroll your Shop 16 times, gain a Tactician's Crown.

augments.name: Rich Get Richer
augments.desc: Gain 12 gold. Your max interest is increased to 7.

augments.name: Rich Get Richer+
augments.desc: Gain 18 gold. Your max interest is increased to 7.

augments.name: Risky Moves
augments.desc: Your Tactician loses 20 Health, but after 7 player combats, gain 30 gold.

augments.name: Roll The Dice
augments.desc:
Gain a Rascal's Gloves item. This equips 2 random Radiant items every round.

Radiant items are very powerful versions of completed items.

augments.name: Row Rejuvenation II
augments.desc: Your team has 9% Omnivamp, increased by 1.5% for every champion that starts combat in that same row.

augments.name: Cruel Pact

augments.name: Salvage Bin+

augments.name: Scoped Weapons II
augments.desc: Your units that start combat in the back 2 rows gain infinite Attack Range.

augments.name: Scoreboard Scrapper
augments.desc: Every round, if you're in the bottom 4, your team permanently gains 1.5% Attack Damage and Ability Power. If you're in the top 4, they have 10% more Health.

augments.name: Second Wind I
augments.desc: After 10 seconds of combat, your units heal 40% of their missing Health.

augments.name: Second Wind II
augments.desc: After 10 seconds of combat, your units heal 60% of their missing Health.

augments.name: Sharing Is Caring
augments.desc: Combat start: You gain 1 gold and your opponent gains 1 gold.

augments.name: Shimmerscale Essence

Gain a Mogul's Mail. In 5 rounds, gain a Gamblers Blade.

augments.name: Shock Treatment

augments.name: Silver Spoon

augments.name: Golden Ticket
augments.desc: Each time your Shop is rerolled, you have a 30% chance to gain a free reroll.

augments.name: Silver Veil

augments.name: Slammin'
augments.desc: Gain 1 random Component(s). After each player combat, if there are no items on your bench (other than Consumables), gain 2 XP.

augments.name: Slammin'+

augments.name: Sleight of Hand
augments.desc: Gain a Thief's Gloves. Champions holding this item gain 100 Health and 20% Attack Speed.

augments.name: March of Progress

augments.name: Social Distancing I

augments.name: Social Distancing II

augments.name: Social Distancing III
augments.desc: Combat start: Units with no adjacent allies gain 25% Attack Damage and Ability Power.

augments.name: Spellblades
augments.desc: Whenever one of your champion casts, their next attack deals bonus magic damage equal to 120% of their Ability Power.

augments.name: Spellcaster's Toolbox
augments.desc: Gain a Manazane. In 3 rounds, gain a Zhonya's Paradox.

augments.name: Stars are Born
augments.desc: The first 1-cost and 2-cost champions you buy are instantly upgraded to 2-star. Gain 7 gold.

augments.name: Starter Kit

Gain a 4-cost champion, a 2-star 1-cost champion that shares a trait with them, and 4 gold.

At the start of the next 2 stages, gain that 4-cost champion again.

augments.name: Stationary Support I
augments.desc: After 8 player combats, gain 1 Training Dummy(s) with 1 permanently attached Support item(s).

augments.name: Stationary Support II
augments.desc: Gain 1 Training Dummy with 1 permanently attached Support item(s).

augments.name: Stationary Support III
augments.desc: Gain 1 Training Dummy with 2 permanently attached Support item(s).

augments.name: Sticks And Stones
augments.desc: Champions that aren't holding items Shred and Sunder enemies for 3 seconds. Physical damage Sunders for 30%, and magic damage Shreds for 30%.

augments.name: Stimpack
augments.desc: Gain 4 components after you lose 50 player health.

augments.name: Subscription Service
augments.desc: Now, and at the start of each Stage, open a Shop of 4 unique 4-cost champions and gain 8 gold.

augments.name: Sunfire Board
augments.desc: At the start of combat, burn all enemies for 10% of their maximum Health over 20 seconds and reduce healing received by 33%.

augments.name: Support Cache
augments.desc: Choose 1 of 4 Support items.

augments.name: Support Golem I
augments.desc: Gain 1 Golem that fights for your team, holding 1 permanently attached Support item(s).

augments.name: Support Golem II
augments.desc: Gain 1 Golem that fights for your team, holding 1 permanently attached Support item(s).

augments.name: Switching Gears
augments.desc: Gain 3 gold whenever you break your win or loss streak.

augments.name: Tactician's Tools
augments.desc: Gain two Spatulas and 1 Component Anvil.

augments.name: Phony Frontline
augments.desc: Gain 2 Target Dummies.

augments.name: Teaming Up I
augments.desc: Gain 1 random component and 2 random Tier 3 champions.

augments.name: Teaming Up II
augments.desc: Gain 1 random Support item and 2 random 4-cost champions.

augments.name: The Golden Egg
augments.desc: Gain a golden egg that hatches in 11 turns for a huge amount of loot. Winning player combat speeds up the hatch timer by an extra turn.

augments.name: The Golden Egg
augments.desc: Gain a golden egg that hatches in 6 turns for a huge amount of loot. Winning player combat speeds up the hatch timer by an extra turn.

augments.name: The Golden Remover
augments.desc:
Gain a Golden Remover and component item anvil.

Golden Remover is an Item Remover with infinite uses.

augments.name: Think Fast
augments.desc: Shop refreshes are free until the end of this round. Traits and other augments do not benefit from these free shops. Gain 3 gold.

augments.name: Thorn-Plated Armor
augments.desc: Gain a Bramble Vest. Your Bramble Vests deal 5-100% more damage (based on Stage) and heal the holder for 50% of the damage dealt.

augments.name: Three's a Crowd
augments.desc: Your team gains 75 Health for each unique 3-cost champion on your board.

augments.name: Three's Company
augments.desc: Gain 5 random 3-cost champions.

augments.name: Wise Spending
augments.desc: Gain 2 experience points when you refresh your Shop.

augments.name: Thrill of the Hunt I
augments.desc: Your units heal 350 Health on kill.

augments.name: Thrill of the Hunt II
augments.desc: Your units heal 550 Health on kill.

augments.name: Tiniest Titan
augments.desc: Gain 2 player health and 1 gold after every player combat. Your Tactician also moves faster.

augments.name: Tiniest Titan+
augments.desc:
Gain 2 player health and 1 gold after every player combat. Your Tactician also moves faster.

Gain 15 gold now.

augments.name: Tiny, but Deadly
augments.desc: Your team is 50% smaller, but moves and attacks 30% faster.

augments.name: Tiny Grab Bag
augments.desc: Gain a random component, 2 gold, a Magnetic Remover.

augments.name: Tiny Titans
augments.desc: Increase your current and max player health by 30.

augments.name: Ancient Archives I
augments.desc: Gain 1 Tome of Traits and 3 gold.

augments.name: Ancient Archives II
augments.desc: Gain 2 Tome of Traits and 5 gold.

augments.name: Tons of Stats!
augments.desc: Your team gains 44 Health, 4% Attack Damage, 4 Ability Power, 4 Armor, 4 Magic Resist, 4% Attack Speed, and 4 Mana.

augments.name: Too Much Candy
augments.desc: Your rerolls cost 0 gold. Every 6 rerolls, the cost goes up by 1 gold. At the start of each stage your reroll cost is reset to 0.

augments.name: Training Reward
augments.desc: Gain 5 gold and a Lesser Champion Duplicator.

augments.name: Training Reward II
augments.desc: Gain 12 gold and a Lesser Champion Duplicator.

augments.name: Training Reward III
augments.desc: Gain 24 gold and a Champion Duplicator.

augments.name: Trade Sector
augments.desc: Gain a free Shop reroll every round. Gain 4 gold.

augments.name: Trade Sector+
augments.desc: Gain a free Shop refresh each round. Gain 10 golds.

augments.name: Built Different I
augments.desc: Your units with no Traits active gain 200-300 Health and 25-55% Attack Speed. (based on current Stage)

augments.name: Built Different
augments.desc: Your units with no Traits active gain 300-600 Health and 45-75% Attack Speed (based on current Stage).

augments.name: Built Different III
augments.desc: Your units with no Traits active gain 300-600 Health and 50-70% Attack Speed (based on current Stage).

augments.name: Trait Tracker
augments.desc: The first time you activate 8 non-unique traits for 1 combat, gain 6 random emblems.

augments.name: Transfusion I
augments.desc: Your team gains 20 Health, plus 2 Health per missing Tactician Health.

augments.name: Transfusion II
augments.desc: Your team gains 40 Health, plus 3 Health per missing Tactician Health.

augments.name: Transfusion III
augments.desc: Your team gains 50 Health, plus 5 Health per missing Tactician Health.

augments.name: Trash to Treasure
augments.desc: Reforging completed items turns them into a random Artifact and does not consume the reforger. Gain a Reforger and 2 Component Anvil(s).

augments.name: Tri Force I
augments.desc: Your Tier 3 champions gain 150 Health, 10 starting Mana, and 10% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Tri Force II
augments.desc: Your Tier 3 champions gain 125 Health, 15 starting Mana, and 15% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Tri Force III
augments.desc: Your Tier 3 champions gain 200 Health, 25 starting Mana, and 25% Attack Speed.

augments.name: True Twos
augments.desc: Gain 1 random 2-star Tier 1 champions and 1 random 2-star Tier 2 champion.

augments.name: Double Trouble I
augments.desc: If you have exactly 2 copies of a champion on your board, they both gain 25 Attack Damage, Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist. When you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

augments.name: Double Trouble II
augments.desc: When you field exactly 2 copies of a champion, they both gain 30% Attack Damage and 30 Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist. When you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

augments.name: Double Trouble III
augments.desc: When you field exactly 2 copies of a champion, they both gain 40% Attack Damage and 40 Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist. When you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

augments.name: Twin Terror I
augments.desc: When you field exactly 2 copies of a champion, they both gain 350 Health and 35% Attack Speed. Anytime you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

augments.name: Twin Terror II
augments.desc: When you field exactly 2 copies of a champion, they both gain 500 Health, 50% Attack Speed. Anytime you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

augments.name: Two for One
augments.desc: Each round, get a copy of the first champion you buy that costs 3 or less.

augments.name: Two Healthy
augments.desc: Your team gains 80 Health for each unique 2-cost champion on your board.

augments.name: Two Tanky
augments.desc: When you field exactly 2 copies of a champion, they both gain 550 Health. When one copy dies, the other gains a 40% max health Shield for 6 seconds. When you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

augments.name: Legend Augment - Silver
augments.desc: To comply Riot Games' policy, selected Legend Augments will not be displayed. In stage 2-1, a silver-level legend augment was selected.

augments.name: Legend Augment - Gold
augments.desc: To comply Riot Games' policy, selected Legend Augments will not be displayed. In stage 2-1, a gold-level legend augment was selected.

augments.name: Legend Augment - Prismatic
augments.desc: To comply Riot Games' policy, selected Legend Augments will not be displayed. In stage 2-1, a prismatic-level legend augment was selected.

augments.name: Unleashed Arcana
augments.desc:
Gain a Jeweled Gauntlet, a Rabadon's Deathcap, a Needlessly Large Rod, and a Magnetic Remover.

Useful for Magic Carries or Magic Casters!

augments.name: Unleash The Beast
augments.desc: Gain a Sterak's Gage. When its effect triggers, the holder gains 35% Attack Speed for the rest of combat and immunity to crowd control for 5 seconds.

augments.name: Upward Mobility
augments.desc: Buying XP costs 1 less. Gain 2 Health and 3 free rerolls whenever you level up.

augments.name: Urf's Grab Bag I
augments.desc: Gain 1 Spatula and 1 random item component.

augments.name: Urf's Grab Bag II
augments.desc: Gain 1 Spatula and 3 random item components.

augments.name: Vampirism I
augments.desc:
Your team gains 20 Health. Gain another 2 Health and 1% Omnivamp per 5 missing player health.
(Omnivamp: healing for a percent of damage dealt)

augments.name: Vampirism II
augments.desc:
Your team gains 50 Health. Gain another 6 Health and 1% Omnivamp per 5 missing player health.
(Omnivamp: healing for a percent of damage dealt)

augments.name: Verdant Veil
augments.desc: Your units are immune to crowd control effects for the first 20 seconds of combat. Gains 15% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Vertically Inclined
augments.desc:
Your team deals 9% more damage.

Deal 18% more damage instead if you have less active non-unique traits than your opponent.

augments.name: Wandering Trainer II
augments.desc: Gain 6 gold and a Training Dummy with 3 permanently attached Emblems.

augments.name: Wandering Trainer I
augments.desc: Gain 1 gold and a Training Dummy with 2 permanently attached Emblems.

augments.name: What Doesn't Kill You
augments.desc: Gain 2 gold after losing a player combat. Gain a random component after every 4 losses.

augments.name: What the Forge
augments.desc: Completed items you own (except Tactician's Crown and Emblems) are transformed into random Artifacts. Champions gain 60 Health per equipped Artifact. Gain 1 Artifact Anvil.

augments.name: Windfall
augments.desc: Gain 20 gold.

augments.name: Windfall+
augments.desc: Gain 35 gold.

augments.name: Windfall++
augments.desc: Gain 40 gold.

augments.name: Woodland Charm
augments.desc: Your highest Health champion is cloned. Clones cannot hold items.

augments.name: Worth the Wait
augments.desc: Gain a random two-star 1-cost champion. After 2 rounds, gain another copy of them at the start of each round for the rest of the game.

augments.name: Worth the Wait II
augments.desc: Gain a random 2-cost champion. Gain another copy of them at the start of each round for the rest of the game.

augments.name: You Have My Bow
augments.desc: Gain a Recurve Bow. Your units gain 12% Attack Speed.

augments.name: You Have My Sword
augments.desc: Gain a B.F. Sword. Your units gain 15% Attack Damage.

augments.name: Young and Wild and Free
augments.desc: You can always move freely on Carousel rounds. Gain 5 gold.

augments.name: A Golden Find
augments.desc: Champions evolved by the Anomaly drop 2 gold every 3 kills. Gain 10 free rerolls.

augments.name: A Magic Roll
augments.desc: Roll 3 dice. Gain rewards based on their total.

augments.name: Academic Research
augments.desc: Whenever you build an item, gain a completed item anvil instead. That anvil always offers an Academy item and the item built. Gain 1 random components. Gain a Lux and an Ezreal.

augments.name: Academy Crest
augments.desc: Gain an Academy Emblem and a Leona.

augments.name: Academy Crown
augments.desc: Gain an Academy Emblem and a random sponsored item.

augments.name: Adrenaline Burst
augments.desc: Combat start and every 6 seconds, all Quickstrikers attack 85% faster for 2.5 seconds. Gain a Nocturne and Akali.

augments.name: Ambusher Crest
augments.desc: Gain an Ambusher Emblem and a Camille.

augments.name: Ambusher Crown
augments.desc: Gain an Ambusher Emblem, a Hand of Justice, and a Camille.

augments.name: An Exalted Adventure
augments.desc: Gain three 2-cost champions. If you 3-star two of them, gain an orb filled with loot. Gain a Lesser Champion Duplicator at the start of next 2 stages.

augments.name: Another Anomaly
augments.desc: After the Anomaly round on 4-6, gain an item that duplicates the chosen Anomaly Effect onto the equipped champion.

augments.name: Arcane Retribution
augments.desc: When Sorcerers die, they deal 300% of their Ability Power as magic damage to all adjacent units. Gain a Lux and Vladimir.

augments.name: Artifactory
augments.desc: At the start of each turn, your benched completed items transform into a random Artifact item. Gain 1 Artifact Anvil and 2 Removers.

augments.name: Artillerist Crest
augments.desc: Gain an Artillerist Emblem and a Tristana.

augments.name: Artillerist Crown
augments.desc: Gain an Artillerist Emblem, a Runaan's Hurricane, and a Tristana.

augments.name: Automata Crest
augments.desc: Gain an Automata Emblem and a Nocturne.

augments.name: Automata Crown
augments.desc: Gain an Automata Emblem, a Guardbreaker, and a Nocturne.

augments.name: Backup
augments.desc: Your team gains 12% Attack Speed if at least 4 allies start combat in the back two rows.

augments.name: Bad Luck Protection
augments.desc: Your team can no longer critically strike. Convert each 1% Critical Strike Chance into 1% Attack Damage. Gain a Sparring Gloves.

augments.name: Battle Scars
augments.desc: Every time Watchers are attacked, they gain 2% Attack Damage. Every time Watchers are hit by an ability, they gain 4 Ability Power. Gain a Vander.

augments.name: Belt Overflow
augments.desc: Gain 5 Giant's Belts. Your Giant's Belts grant +60 bonus Health.

augments.name: Black Rose Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Black Rose Emblem.

augments.name: Black Rose Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Black Rose Emblem, a Spear of Shojin, and a Cassiopeia.

augments.name: Blade Dance
augments.desc: Gain an Irelia. Your strongest Irelia gains 60% Attack Speed and gains a brand new Ability that dashes her between two targets, dealing physical damage to both.

augments.name: Blazing Soul I
augments.desc: Combat start: Your highest Attack Speed champion gains 20 Ability Power and 20% Attack Speed. Repeat on another ally every 3 seconds.

augments.name: Blazing Soul II
augments.desc: Combat start: Your highest Attack Speed champion gains 45 Ability Power and 35% Attack Speed. Repeat on another ally every 3 seconds.

augments.name: BRB
augments.desc: You cannot perform actions for the next 3 rounds. Afterwards, gain 2 completed item anvils.

augments.name: Bronze For Life I
augments.desc: Your team gains 3% Damage Amp for each Bronze-tier trait.

augments.name: Bronze For Life II
augments.desc: Your team gains 3.5% Damage Amp and 1% Durability for each Bronze-tier trait.

augments.name: Bruiser Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Bruiser Emblem and a Sett.

augments.name: Bruiser Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Bruiser Emblem, a Redemption, and a Sett.

augments.name: Brutal Revenge
augments.desc: Gain 2 Rennis. Your strongest Renni's Ability costs 10 less and causes her to lunge towards the farthest enemy within 2 hexes, dealing 110% damage to the target and reduced damage to enemies in her path.

augments.name: Bulky Buddies I
augments.desc: Allies that start combat next to exactly 1 other ally gain 100 Health. When that champion dies, the other gains a 10% max Health Shield for 10 seconds.

augments.name: Bulky Buddies III
augments.desc: Allies that start combat next to exactly 1 other ally gain 330 Health. When that champion dies, the other gains a 18% max Health Shield for 10 seconds.

augments.name: Bulky Buddies II
augments.desc: Allies that start combat next to exactly 1 other ally gain 175 Health. When that champion dies, the other gains a 15% max Health Shield for 10 seconds.

augments.name: Calculated Enhancement
augments.desc: Each combat, 4 random champions in your last two rows gain 40% Attack Damage and 50 Ability Power.

augments.name: Chem-Baron Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Chem-Baron Emblem and a Renata Glasc.

augments.name: Chem-Baron Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Chem-Baron Emblem, a Nashor's Tooth, and a Smeech.

augments.name: Climb The Ladder I
augments.desc: Each time an ally dies, allies that share at least one trait with them gain 3 Ability Power, 3% Attack Damage, 3 Armor, and 3 Magic Resist.

augments.name: Climb The Ladder II
augments.desc: Each time an ally dies, allies that share at least one trait with them gain 6 Ability Power, 6% Attack Damage, 6 Armor, and 6 Magic Resist.

augments.name: Cloning Facility
augments.desc: Empower the hex in the center of the third row. Summon a clone of the champion in it with 80% base Health and 10% increased Mana cost.

augments.name: Combat Medic
augments.desc: Gain a Steb. Your strongest Steb's Ability's Mana cost is reduced by 10, but no longer heals. Steb's spell grants 30% Omnivamp and strikes 3 times, each dealing 65%.

augments.name: Conqueror Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Conqueror Emblem and a Rell.

augments.name: Conqueror Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Conqueror Emblem, a Last Whisper, and a Rell.

augments.name: Contested
augments.desc: After each player combat, gain 2 gold for every 2 other players who have fielded the leftmost unit on your bench this game.

augments.name: Cooking Pot
augments.desc: At the start of each turn, all units holding a Frying Pan or Spatula item grant the nearest champion 50 permanent Health. Gain a Frying Pan.

augments.name: Coronation
augments.desc: Gain a Tactician's Crown. Tactician's Crown, Shield, and Cape grant the holder an additional 25% Attack Speed, 25% Attack Damage, and 35 Ability Power.

augments.name: Corrosion
augments.desc: Enemy champions in the first two rows lose 3 Armor and Magic Resist every 2 seconds.

augments.name: Crafted Crafting
augments.desc: Whenever you craft a completed item, gain 2 rerolls.

augments.name: Crimson Pact
augments.desc: Gain a Vladimir. Your strongest Vladimir gains +3 Range and gains 5 bonus Mana each attack. His Ability no longer heals but grants 10% Damage Amp, deals 80% bonus damage, and spreads additional damage to the nearest enemy.

augments.name: Crown's Will
augments.desc: Gain a Needlessly Large Rod. Your units gain 10 Ability Power and 10 Armor.

augments.name: Diversified Portfolio
augments.desc:
Each round, gain 1 gold for every 3 non-unique traits active.
Gain 1 gold.

augments.name: Diversified Portfolio+
augments.desc:
Each round, gain 1 gold for every 3 non-unique traits active.
Gain 4 gold.

augments.name: Domination
augments.desc: Dominators gain 10% Attack Speed while shielded. When a Dominator gets a kill, all Dominators gain 100 Shield for 3 seconds. Gain a Cassiopeia.

augments.name: Dominator Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Dominator Emblem and a Blitzcrank.

augments.name: Dominator Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Dominator Emblem, a Protector's Vow, and a Blitzcrank.

augments.name: Dummify
augments.desc: Lose all champions on your board and bench. Gain a Training Dummy with 100% of their combined health. The dummy gains 1000 Health per stage.

augments.name: Enforcer Crest
augments.desc: Gain an Enforcer Emblem.

augments.name: Enforcer Crown
augments.desc: Gain an Enforcer Emblem, an Infinity Edge, and a Maddie.

augments.name: Expected Unexpectedness
augments.desc: Now and at the start of the next 2 stages, roll 3 dice. Gain various rewards based on their total.

augments.name: Eye For An Eye
augments.desc: For every 15 ally champions that die, gain a random component (max 4).

augments.name: Eye For An Eye+
augments.desc: Gain a random component. For every 16 ally champions that die, gain another component (max 3).

augments.name: Family Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Family Emblem.

augments.name: Family Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Family Emblem and a Redemption.

augments.name: Final Polish
augments.desc: Gain a Support Anvil and a completed item anvil.

augments.name: Firelight Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Firelight Emblem and a Zeri.

augments.name: Firelight Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Firelight Emblem, a Protector's Vow, and a Scar.

augments.name: Firesale
augments.desc: Each round, steal a random 3-cost or lower champion from the shop. Gain 1 gold.

augments.name: Flurry of Blows
augments.desc: Gain a Zeke's Herald. Champions buffed by Zeke's also gain 45% Critical Strike Chance.

augments.name: Forbidden Magic
augments.desc: Every 2 takedowns by Black Rose champions or Sion grant Sion permanent 3% Attack Damage and 15 Max Health. Gain 3 Black Rose champions. (Stacks: )

augments.name: Forward Thinking
augments.desc: Lose all your gold. After 5 player combats, gain back the original amount and another 70 gold.

augments.name: Fractured Crystals
augments.desc: When an Automata champion fires their blast, they fire a second blast at the closest enemy dealing 70% of the original damage. Gain an Amumu and Nocturne.

augments.name: Ghost of Friends Past
augments.desc: Whenever an allied champion dies, your current team and all future allies permanently gain 7 health, 1% Attack Damage, or 1 Ability Power, based on the dying champion's role.

augments.name: Glass Cannon I
augments.desc: Units that start combat in the back row begin combat at 90% health but gain 15% Damage Amp.

augments.name: Glass Cannon II
augments.desc: Units that start combat in the back row begin combat at 90% health but gain 25% Damage Amp.

augments.name: Gloves Off
augments.desc: Gain a Vander. Your strongest Vander gains a brand new Ability that no longer grants resistances, but deals 70% increased damage and punches the target backwards, dealing 35% of the original damage to all enemies hit.

augments.name: Gold For Dummies
augments.desc: Gain a Training Dummy. Every 10 seconds, all Training Dummies grant 1 gold.

augments.name: Golemify
augments.desc: Lose all champions on your board and bench. Gain a Golem with 90% of their combined Health and 60% of their combined Attack Damage. The Golem gains 500 Health per stage.

augments.name: Greater Moonlight
augments.desc: Combat Start: 1 random 1-cost champion is upgraded to 4-star for that round and gains 5% Attack Damage and 5 Ability Power.

augments.name: Aerial Warfare
augments.desc: Firelight champions gain 9% Attack Damage and 9 Ability Power when they start a Firelight dash. They gain another 3% for every hex traveled that combat. Gain a Scar and Zeri.

augments.name: Hall of Mirrors
augments.desc: Combat start: All champions in your front row become clones of the champion in the center of the row. Clones have 100% of their original health, and deal 40% less damage.

augments.name: Health is Wealth I
augments.desc: Your team gains 10% Omnivamp. Get a bonus of 8 gold when your team first accumulates 10000 total champion healing.

augments.name: Health is Wealth II
augments.desc: Your team gains 15% Omnivamp. Get a bonus of 15 gold when your team first accumulates 10000 total champion healing.

augments.name: Heavily Smash
augments.desc: Every 4 seconds, Bruisers deal 7% bonus max Health bonus physical damage on their next attack. Gain a Steb and a Trundle.

augments.name: This Will Work
augments.desc: Gain a Powder. Your strongest Powder's explosion radius is increased by 5 hexes, Increases damage dealt.

augments.name: Investment Strategy I
augments.desc: Your champions gain 8 permanent max health per interest you earn.

augments.name: Investment Strategy II
augments.desc: Gain 5 gold. Your champions gain 9 permanent max health per interest you earn. Your max interest is increased to 7.

augments.name: Kingslayer
augments.desc: After winning player combat, gain 1 gold. If they had more health than you, gain 6 Gold instead. Gain 1 gold now.

augments.name: Law Enforcement
augments.desc: Enforcer champions gain 10% Attack Damage. Every 6 Wanted enemy deaths grant 6 gold. Gain a Steb and Maddie.

augments.name: Lineup
augments.desc: Your team gains 2.5 Armor and Magic Resist for each unit that starts combat in the front two rows.

augments.name: Lone Hero
augments.desc: Your last surviving unit gains 140% Attack Speed and 35% Durability

augments.name: Loot Explosion
augments.desc: Ambusher kills have a chance to drop loot, scaling with Critical Strike Chance. The value of the loot given can also critically strike, granting even more loot. Gain a Camille and a Powder.

augments.name: Mace's Will
augments.desc: Gain a Sparring Gloves. Your team gains 8% Attack Speed and 20% Critical Strike Chance.

augments.name: Mad Chemist
augments.desc:
Gain a Singed. Your strongest Singed cannot attack but constantly runs, leaving a poison trail dealing magic damage over time. His Ability will always target himself and instead grants 30% Omnivamp and Move Speed.
Magic Damage: 140% / 210% / 315% / 420%

augments.name: Malicious Monetization
augments.desc: Gain 2 gold. For the next 3 rounds, enemy champions drop 2 gold when killed.

augments.name: Manaflow I
augments.desc: Your units that start combat in the back row gain 2 additional Mana per attack.

augments.name: Manaflow II
augments.desc: Your units that start combat in the back row gain 4 additional Mana per attack.

augments.name: Max Cap
augments.desc: Your max level is 7. Gain 1 Tactician's Shield which increases your team size by +1, and 60 gold.

augments.name: Moonlight
augments.desc: Combat start: 1 random 1-cost champion is upgraded to 3-star for that round and gains 45% Attack Damage and 45 Ability Power.

augments.name: NO SCOUT NO PIVOT
augments.desc: Units can no longer be benched or sold after fighting in a player combat. After each player combat, units that fought gain 20 Health, 1.5% Attack Damage, and 1.5% Ability Power.

augments.name: Noble Sacrifice
augments.desc: When your first ally dies each combat, grant your team 25 + 10% of that ally's Armor and Magic Resistance.

augments.name: Noxian Guillotine
augments.desc: Conquerors execute enemies below 12% Health. When they do, they gain 5 Armor and Magic Resist for the rest of combat. Gain a Darius and Draven.

augments.name: One Buff, Two Buff
augments.desc: Gain a Red Buff, a Blue Buff, and a Champion Duplicator.

augments.name: One For All I
augments.desc: Your team gains 2% max Health and 1.5% Damage Amp for each unique one-cost champion on your board. Gain 2 one-costs.

augments.name: One For All II
augments.desc: Your team gains 3% max Health and 2% Damage Amp for each unique one-cost champion on your board. Gain 3 one-costs.

augments.name: Overheal
augments.desc: Every third attack deals an additional 150% damage and heals 50% of the damage. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 300 Health.

augments.name: Paint the Town Blue
augments.desc: When the first 4 Rebels die each combat, summon a copy of themselves that is one-star lower with 400 less Health. Gain an Akali and an Irelia.

augments.name: Pair of Fours
augments.desc: If your team has exactly 2 four-cost champions, they each gain 404 Health and 24.4% Attack Speed. Gain a random 4-cost.

augments.name: Piercing Lotus I
augments.desc: Your team gains 5% Critical Strike chance, and their Abilities can critically strike. Critical strikes 20% Shred and Sunder the target for 3 seconds.

augments.name: Piercing Lotus II
augments.desc: Your team gains 20% Critical Strike chance, and their Abilities can critically strike. Critical strikes 20% Shred and Sunder the target for 3 seconds.

augments.name: Pit Fighter Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Pit Fighter Emblem and an Urgot.

augments.name: Pit Fighter Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Pit Fighter Emblem, a Sterak's Gage, and a Gangplank.

augments.name: Power Up
augments.desc: Your next augment is one tier higher.

augments.name: Powered Shields
augments.desc: While Shielded, your units gain 10% Durability. The first time allies fall below 50% Health, they gain 100-225 Shield (based on Stage) for 3 seconds.

augments.name: Prismatic Pipeline
augments.desc: The next non-player combat round will drop an additional Prismatic Orb full of amazing loot.

augments.name: Pyromaniac
augments.desc: Gain a Red Buff. Your Burns deal 50% increased damage.

augments.name: Quality Over Quantity
augments.desc:
Units holding exactly 1 item upgrade that item to Radiant. Units holding Radiant items gain 4% Health. Gain 2 Magnetic Removers.

Thief's Gloves counts as multiple items.

augments.name: Quickstriker Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Quickstriker Emblem and an Akali.

augments.name: Quickstriker Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Quickstriker Emblem, a Guinsoo's Rageblade, and a Nocturne.

augments.name: Rebel Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Rebel Emblem and an Akali.

augments.name: Rebel Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Rebel Emblem, a Jeweled Gauntlet, and an Akali.

augments.name: Reroll Transfer
augments.desc:
For every 1 unused Augment Reroll, gain 3 free shop rerolls. Gain 3 gold.

Does not include the round this augment is selected.

augments.name: Rigged Shop
augments.desc: Your next shop and every 4 shops will contain all 3-cost champions.

augments.name: Rigged Shop+
augments.desc: Your next shop and every 4 shops will contain all 3-cost champions. Gain 9 rerolls.

augments.name: Rocket Collection
augments.desc: Artillerist rockets deal 15% increased damage. Every 65 rockets your Artillerists fire, gain a Collector (max 2). Gain a Tristana and Urgot. (Rockets Fired: )

augments.name: Sated Spellweaver
augments.desc: After casting an Ability, champions gain 20% Omnivamp for 3 seconds. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 300 Health.

augments.name: Scavenger
augments.desc: The first 5 enemy champions that are killed each combat grant a champion on your team a temporary completed item.

augments.name: Scrap Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Scrap Emblem and a Ziggs.

augments.name: Scrap Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Scrap Emblem, a Ziggs, and 2 random components.

augments.name: Sentinel Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Sentinel Emblem and a Rell.

augments.name: Sentinel Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Sentinel Emblem, a Crownguard, and a Loris.

augments.name: Shield Bash
augments.desc: Sentinels gain 5% bonus Armor and Magic Resist. Every 4 seconds, their next attack deals 75% of their total resistances as magic damage. Gain a Loris.

augments.name: Shop Glitch
augments.desc: During non-player combat rounds, your shop refreshes for free every 2.5 seconds for 30 seconds.

augments.name: Sniper Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Sniper Emblem and a Zeri.

augments.name: Sniper Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Sniper Emblem, an Infinity Edge, and a Zeri.

augments.name: Sniper's Nest
augments.desc: Snipers gain +8% Damage Amp for each round fought from the same starting hex (Maximum +32%). Gain a Zeri.

augments.name: Sorcerer Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Sorcerer Emblem and a Vladimir.

augments.name: Sorcerer Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Sorcerer Emblem, an Adaptive Helm, and a Vladimir.

augments.name: Spear's Will
augments.desc: Your team gains 10% Attack Damage and 10 Mana. Gain a B.F. Sword.

augments.name: Spirit Link
augments.desc: Your team restores 6% of their max Health every 4 seconds. Increase the healing by 0.5% for every 10 missing player Health.

augments.name: Sponging
augments.desc: Combat start: Up to 6 champions with 1 or fewer items gain a copy of a random completed item from the nearest itemized ally.

augments.name: Starry Night
augments.desc:
1-cost and 2-cost units in your shop have a chance to be 2-star. Gain 6 gold.
Chances increase with player level.

augments.name: Starry Night+
augments.desc:
1-cost and 2-cost units in your shop have a chance to be 2-star. Gain 8 gold.
Chances increase with player level.

augments.name: Superstars I
augments.desc: Your team deals 5% more damage, increased by 2% for every 3-star champion on your team. Gain 2 rerolls.

augments.name: Superstars II
augments.desc: Your team deals 7% more damage, increased by 4% for every 3-star champion on your team. Gain 4 rerolls.

augments.name: Support Mining
augments.desc: Gain a Training Dummy. When it dies 7 times, gain a random Support Item and remove the Training Dummy.

augments.name: Support Mining+
augments.desc: Gain a Training Dummy. When it dies 5 times, gain a random Support Item and remove the Training Dummy.

augments.name: Survivor
augments.desc: After 3 players are eliminated, gain 92 gold.

augments.name: Sword Overflow
augments.desc: Gain 5 BF Swords. Your BF Swords grant +3% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Table Scraps
augments.desc: After the next 3 carousels, gain one unit that was not taken and its item. Gain 1 gold.

augments.name: Tactician's Kitchen
augments.desc: Gain a random Emblem. After 3 player combats, gain a Tactician's Cape.

augments.name: The Mutation Survives
augments.desc: Experiments gain 12% Health and grant a special hex. The Experiment in the hex is killed on combat start, granting their Experiment bonus to other laboratory hexes. Gain 3 Experiment champions.

augments.name: Titanic Titan
augments.desc: Increase your current and max player health by 25. On carousel rounds you are released earlier, but are much slower.

augments.name: Tomb Raider I
augments.desc: For the next 3 players eliminated, choose one of their completed items to keep.

augments.name: Tomb Raider II
augments.desc: Gain 1 completed item Anvil. Every time a player is eliminated, choose one of their completed items to keep.

augments.name: Top of the Scrap Heap
augments.desc: Every 6 components Scrap champions convert, gain a random component (max 5). Gain a Powder and a Trundle.

augments.name: Tower Defense
augments.desc: Gain a Training Dummy equipped with a random emblem that fires ranged attacks at enemies. It upgrades as the game goes on.

augments.name: Training Arc
augments.desc: Pit Fighters permanently gain 1.5% Attack Damage if they lost the last combat. If they won, gain 50 Health instead. Gain an Urgot.

augments.name: Trait: Geniuses
augments.desc:
When Heimerdinger casts, Ekko releases 3 afterimages, each dealing 50% damage. When Ekko casts, Heimerdinger fires 3 missiles, each dealing 150% damage.

Gain a Heimerdinger, Ekko, and a Jeweled Gauntlet.

augments.name: Trait: Martial Law
augments.desc:
When Ambessa casts, Caitlyn fires an empowered attack at the target, dealing 200% damage. Ambessa gains 18% of Caitlyn's Attack Damage.

Gain a Caitlyn and Ambessa.

augments.name: Trait: Menaces
augments.desc:
While fielded with Silco, Powder gains Dominator, but no longer benefits from Family. When her monkey explodes, it creates 3 of Silco's monstrosities.

Gain a 2-star Powder and a Silco.

augments.name: Trait: Reunion
augments.desc:
When Vi casts, Ekko releases 3 afterimages towards her target dealing 40% damage. When Ekko casts, Vi slams an earthquake towards his target dealing 100% damage.

Gain a Vi and Ekko.

augments.name: Trait: Sisters
augments.desc:
Gain the Sister Trait. When Vi scores a takedown, Jinx gains 80% bonus Attack Speed for 10 seconds. When Jinx scores a takedown, Vi gains 80% bonus Attack Damage for 10 seconds.

Gain a Vi and Jinx.

augments.name: Trait: Unlikely Duo
augments.desc:
Jinx and Sevika gain 10% Attack Damage and 100 Health. Whenever one casts, they grant the other 10 mana. Sevika's arm is luckier.

Gain a Jinx and Sevika.

augments.name: Trifecta I
augments.desc: Gain 2 3-cost champions. Combat Start: 3 random 3-cost champions gain 250 Health and 23% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Trifecta II
augments.desc: Gain 3 3-cost champions. Allies gain 9% Attack Speed. Combat Start: 3 random 3-cost champions gain 330 Health and 33% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Trolling
augments.desc: Gain a Trundle. Your strongest Trundle's Ability no longer heals, but grants him 140% Attack Speed for 5 seconds, and permanently grants him 1.5% Attack Damage. His maximum mana is reduced by 50.

augments.name: Two Much Value
augments.desc: Gain 1 reroll for every 2 unique two-cost champions fielded last combat. Gain 2 two-cost unit.

augments.name: Two Trick
augments.desc: Gain a random 2-star two-cost and 2 random 2-star one-cost champions.

augments.name: Underdogs
augments.desc: Whenever your team has fewer units alive than your opponent, your units regenerate 8% Health each second (maximum: 150).

augments.name: Vampiric Vitality
augments.desc: You heal for 20% of the damage you deal to enemy Tacticians. Your units gain 12% Omnivamp.

augments.name: Visionary Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Visionary Emblem and a Renata Glasc.

augments.name: Visionary Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Visionary Emblem, a Spear of Shojin, and a Renata Glasc.

augments.name: Void Swarm
augments.desc: Gain a Zz'Rot Portal and another after every 10 player combats. Zz'Rot Portal Voidlings gain 40% Attack Speed and 40% Omnivamp.

augments.name: Voidcaller
augments.desc:
For every 275 Mana Visionaries spend during combat, summon a Voidling, up to 5 Voidlings. Gain a Rell and Morgana.

The Voidling has 400-600 Health based on Stage.

augments.name: Wand Overflow
augments.desc: Gain 5 Needlessly Large Rods. Your Needlessly Large Rods grant +5% Attack Speed.

augments.name: War for the Undercity
augments.desc: Everytime you choose to save your Shimmer on a Black Market, heal 4 player health and gain 6 gold. Gain a Renni.

augments.name: Warpath

Vander gains 30 permanent max Health each time Silco casts. Silco gains 6 permanent Ability Power each time Vander dies.

Gain a 2-star Vander, a Silco, and a Spear of Shojin.

Gain a 2-star Maddie and Ambessa.

Tasks can be completed in any order.

augments.name: What You Really Are
